summary:
I am a passionate storyteller, using both words and images, to tell the stories that matter. 
​With a background as a multimedia journalist, I am equipped with the technical knowhow to produce and edit compelling, high-qualitative multimedia content.

Besides storytelling, I have 10+ years’ experience in developing and implementing communication strategies that will help your organization or project to get the visibility it deserves. 

What I have to offer: 
- Supporting your organization or project to design and implement behavioral communication and visibility strategies (both long term and short term) 
- Training your core team members to implement these strategies and to take their visual storytelling skills to the next level (both long term and short term) 
- Producing and editing compelling, high-qualitative articles, videos, concept notes, proposals, annual reports, etc, using the principles of Dignified Storytelling
- Designing e-learning modules with the aim to increase knowledge and/or change behaviors

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Christien van den Brink - Storytelling beyond Borders', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Christien van den Brink - Storytelling beyond Borders', 'description': 'I am a passionate storyteller, using both words and images, to tell the stories that matter. 
​With a background as a multimedia journalist, I am equipped with the technical knowhow to produce and edit compelling, high-qualitative multimedia content. My online portfolio contains some of my visual storytelling work delivered for clients such as UNESCO, UNRWA, Bayer Foundation, myAgro, ICCO STARS and ICCO Cooperation. 

Besides storytelling, I have 10+ years’ experience in developing and implementing communication strategies that will help your organization or project to get the visibility it deserves. 

Most notably, I spent the past 1,5 years as a strategic communications consultant for the social enterprise Seefar, designing and testing innovative, locally rooted, strategic communication campaign ideas which aimed to drive sustainable change in people’s knowledge and behaviors related to migration, human trafficking, modern slavery and public health. I supported the Strategic Communications team to develop their capabilities, while monitoring their (online) behavior communications campaigns across the globe. 

Key achievements and responsibilities for Seefar: 

- Managing a team of 4 communication consultants + 1 graphic designer
- Leading the ideation and inception phase of 8 communication campaigns (all campaigns had at least 2 of the following components; online outreach, educational outreach, community outreach, 1:1 counseling on migration decision making, 1:1 counseling on mental health) 
- Overseeing the implementation of 4 to 6 communication campaigns simultaneously running in Senegal, Mali, Nigeria, Iraq, Afghanistan, Pakistan and The Philippines
- Setting up and leading social media experiments to test behavior and knowledge change on Facebook and Instagram
- Developing training materials and online learning tools for our target audiences using Moodle and Canva

For a campaign example, please follow this link: https://seefar.org/the-migrant-project/', 'title': 'Strategic Communications Advisor and Visual Storyteller', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'myAgro', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Senegal', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'myAgro', 'description': '•	Develop and implement the regional strategies for communications, government relations and fundraising
